verses.1: Tua ahih ciangin vantung, leitung le a sunga omte kiman khin hi.
verses.2: Ni sagih ma-in Pasian in a nasepte zo khinta a, ama hih sa nasep khempeuh panin ni sagih ni-in a tawlnga hi.
verses.3: Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ni sagih ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh piansak nasepna ama nasep khempeuh panin tua ni-in Pasian a tawlnga hi.
verses.4: Hihte pen, a kipiansak lai-a vantung le leitung tangthu ahi hi. Topa Pasian in leitung le vantungte a bawl hi.
verses.5: Topa Pasian in leitungah guah zusak nai lo a, leitang a kho ding mi om lo ahih manin gam sung kungnote lei sungah om nai lo a, lo sung ankungte po khia lo hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin leitung panin meii lum kaai to-in, lei maitang khempeuh a buah hunin
verses.7: Topa Pasian in leilak pan a leivui tawh mihing bawl a, a nak sungah nuntakna hu sang suk hi. Tua mi pen leitung nuntakna a nei mihing hong suak pah hi.
verses.8: Topa Pasian in nisuahna lam, Eden ah huan khat bawl hi. Tua lai munah ama bawl sa mipa koih hi.
verses.9: A deihhuai, nek dinga a hoih singkung nam khempeuh, huan laizang ah nuntakna singkung le a pha le a sia theihna singkung, lei sung panin Topa Pasian in posak hi.
verses.10: Huan sung a kawtsak dingin Eden nawkin gun khat hong luang a, tua mun panin gun hong kikhenin li hong pha hi.
verses.11: A masa pen gun a min Pishon hi a, kham a omna, Havilah gambup kimkot ah a luang pen ahi hi.
verses.12: Tua gam a khamte hoih hi. Tua munah bedolak singnai le onik suang om hi.
verses.13: A nihna gun min Gihon hi a, Kush gam kimkot ah a luang pen ahi hi.
verses.14: Assiria gam nisuahna lamah a luang a thumna gun min Hiddekel ahi hi. A lina gun pen Eufratis gun ahi hi.
verses.15: Topa Pasian in mipa la-in, Eden huan kho-in a kem dingin a koih hi.
verses.16: Topa Pasian in mipa thu pia a, “Na ututin huan sung singkung gah khempeuh na ne thei ding hi.
verses.17: Ahih hangin a pha le a sia theihna singkung gah pen na ne kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua na nek ni-in na si ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.18: Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “Mipa amah guak a om ding hoih lo hi. Ama ading a kituak a huh ding ka bawlsak ding hi,” ci hi.
verses.19: Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in gam sung ganhing khempeuh le huihlak vasa khempeuh lei tawh bawl a, mipa in tuate bang a ci hiam ci-in a theih nadingin mipa kiangah tuate a paipih hi. Nuntakna a nei khempeuhte pen mipaʼ cih bangbang a min hi pahpah hi.
verses.20: Mipa in ganhing nam khempeuh, huihlak vasa khempeuh le gam sung ganhing khempeuh min a vawh hi. Ahih hangin mipa aʼ dinga a kilawm, amah a huh ding khat zong om lo hi.
verses.21: Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in mipa ihmut suak sak mahmah a, ama ihmut kalin a nakguhte khat la-in tua mun pen satak tawh a dimsak hi.
verses.22: Topa Pasian in mipaʼ tung panin a lakkhiat nakguh pen numei khatin bawl a, mipa kiangah tua nu a paipih hi.
verses.23: Tua ciangin mipa in, “Tu petpetin hih pen keima guhte le keima sate ahi hi. Amah pen mipa sung panin a kila khia ahih manin ‘Numei’ kici ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.24: Tua thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm a, amau tegel pum khat a bang uh hi.
verses.25: Mipa le a zi a guaktangin om uh a, maizum lo uh hi.
